meanings.definition: A synthetic element with the symbol Db and atomic number 105.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study dubnium to learn more about synthetic elements.
meanings.sent2: The periodic table includes dubnium as a synthetic element.
meanings.sent3: When dubnium met plutonium at the lab, they had a chemical reaction!
meanings.sent4: In the world of elements, dubnium shines like a unique gem.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of dubnium marked a significant advancement in chemistry.

meanings.definition: The name of the element with atomic number 105.
meanings.sent1: Do you know the name of the element with atomic number 105? It's dubnium!
meanings.sent2: Chemists use the term dubnium to refer to the element with atomic number 105.
meanings.sent3: At the science fair, the student dressed up as dubnium, the element superhero!
meanings.sent4: In the world of elements, dubnium stands out like a bold title.
meanings.sent5: Learning about dubnium in chemistry class was both fun and educational.
